attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: One of the worst apps I’ve had. I came on here to check about some news and the app kept on crashing every time I wanted to go on it.

attributes.title: Phoney bologna
attributes.review: This app is ATROCIOUS and seriously OFFENSIVE, I was terrified even scrolling through the very first pic you see when opening the app 🤬 this NEEDS to be taken down. I can’t believe this is even allowed on the app store.

attributes.title: trash✨🧚‍♀️❤️
attributes.review: the app feels like a virus, my phone keeps kicking me out of the app and other apps, it has never done this and i have an iPhone Xs so my phone isnt that old to use that as an excuse. dont download a virus.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I tried to use this app and it literally didn’t work! I opened it up and it was a blank screen. Also what kind of president makes an app for themselves. This isn’t a following it’s a cult. DISGUSTING

attributes.title: Fruit
attributes.review: I downloaded the app but it took half of my space and now my apps won’t even open I’m truly disappointed in our orange so I seriously don’t recommend this app AT ALL 😭😔

attributes.title: do not download this app.
attributes.review: this app is single handily the worst app i’ve ever seen. the second you open it your left knee cap falls off INSTANTLY. i don’t know how this man coded an app that does this but he did. it’s absolutely disgusting.

attributes.title: Eww
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever I would not download it first of all you have to see a racist Cheeto on the fron I fell out my chair god pls bleach me eyes so yea don’t download it and get it below 1 star review so we can get Cheetos app off the App Store- 💀 sincerely trumps biggest hater bye

attributes.title: You can not control us
attributes.review: You may be able to ban Tik tok to try to control us but Gen-Z will continue to find ways to twist your mind. Know that if you ban Tik tok it’ll only become worse for you. ;)

I am highly disgusted. I wasn’t aware of how hideous Donald Duck oh I’m sorry trump was until I opened the app. AND ON TOP OF THAT IT GAVE ME A VIRUSSSS. Donald trump is a menace to society and the app should be banned ASAP. Whew Chile what a waste of storage. Anyways all I got to say is this app should be no more. Apple get on it🙂

attributes.title: I don’t like the view😔🙃🥺🙈
attributes.review: I can’t open my eyes when i use the app cause his face and hair is everywhere and i got really scared i had to sleep in my parents room last night the app is scary😭😭😭😭😭😔😔😔😔
